titles.title: Keep the Promise Act of 2014
A bill to prohibit gaming activities on certain Indian land in Arizona until the expiration of certain gaming compacts.
Keep the Promise Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 113-506.

bill.summary: Keep the Promise Act of 2014 - Restricts gaming on land within the Phoenix, Arizona metropolitan area acquired by the Secretary of the Interior in trust for the benefit of an Indian tribe after April 9, 2013. Terminates the restriction on January 1, 2027.
